about.title: About us
about.subtitle: We craft glamping experiences in Lunahuaná, blending nature, comfort, and gastronomy.
about.our_story_text: We were born to bring you closer to nature without giving up comfort. Our team takes care of every detail—from tent design to adventure, relaxation, and cuisine experiences.

validations.min_kids: Number of kids cannot be negative.
validations.min_babys: Number of babys cannot be negative.

validations.end_date_invalid: End date must be a valid date.
